# Shop (Building)
## Overview
**Shop**

**Create** 14 Goods, 1 Influence, 12 Labor (550 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]], 1 [[Storefront (Room)|Storefront]]

A general store.
